com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.interfaces

Interface UserDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserDao
    UserDao is an Interface class which has all the methods to query the users table in the Database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
